body.name: HAMTYSAN Raspberry Pi Screen 7 Inch HDMI Monitor 800x480 LCD Screen Display Mini Small Monitor for Raspberry Pi 4/3/2/Zero/B/B+ Win11/10/8/7 (Non-Touch), Driver Free
body.stockDetail: Only 20 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 5 hrs 4 mins
FREE pickup Friday, February 16. Order within 5 hrs 4 mins
features: Mini HDMI Monitor - HAMTYSAN 7 inch raspberry pi display with 800*480 resolution, adopts tempered glass and full lamination technology,compared with traditional technology, its function is to make the image more clear and transparent, and play a role in preventing dust. Equipped with a multi angle adjustable bracket, the groove rubber effectively protects the display and stably supports the LCD screen. Raspberry pi enthusiasts are very suitable for this small monitor.

Plug-n-Play & Fast Installation - Simply connect the screen to device via HDMI interface and power the USB port to achieve function and no need to install any driver. The Switch button can turn on/off the monitor at any time, making it convenient for you to save power and reduce losses. It is a very energy-saving portable HDMI monitor.

Versatile Digital Efficient Connection - Raspberry pi monitor for HDMI, micro USB make it easy connection with Laptops, PCs, Gaming Devices, 3D printer and other HDMI devices. 7inch mini monitor is light and easy to carry that great ideal for extending your screen on business trip, travel, or home entertainment. Please Note: This LCD monitor have not a case.

Wide Compatibility - HAMTYSAN 7inch monitor is perfectly suited for all versions of Raspberry Pi including Raspberry Pi 400/4/3/2/1/3B+/BB. Other devices like Octo Pi, Banana Pi, Retro Pi, game consoles( NS / XBOX / PS4. Not compatible with PS5),CCTV, laptop, TV boxes, etc. The HDMI portable monitor also great compatibility with various OS such as Windows, Noobs, Debian, Ubuntu, Kodi.

Perfect Service - All HAMTYSAN monitors are tested and fully packaged before leaving the factory. If there are any quality issues with the product within 30 days, you can contact us for assistance. HAMTYSAN focuses on providing customers with better products and services.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little monitor
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I got this for using with my scratch built long range quadcopter. (Drone) it has a HD Zero video system in it and wanted a small screen capable of the HD video feed for letting others see the video at the same time I am. It works really well for this and as it can be powered from a power brick it is a much easier solution than my 12v dc 19” monitor as well as being easier to pack up and move. I will have to build a case for it as there is exposed components on the back but, it works great. I could also see this as a great monitor to turn a PlayStation or XBox into a portable system.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Inexpensive, but perfect quality
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this as a grab and go screen, and it doesn't disappoint. I connected without problems and has worked flawlessly with the Beelink computer that I use for astrophotography. Not much more to say.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good little screen, but note that back is not enclosed
reviews.reviewText: I bought this little screen to connect to the HDMI output of my universal disc player (to navigate on screen menus while in a home audio setting). It works well and the picture quality is fine for this purpose. It included the necessary usb cord for power (I’m using an old iPhone plug for wall connection, and also included an HDMI cable. There is also a little stand that enables you to stand the screen up. The unit has an open back, however, exposing the internals. This is not suitable to hold while using, or for kids. It’s not like an iPad or tablet that is enclosed. It’s designed to be propped up in its stand, or perhaps installed in another object (car seat headrest?).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I take this with me out on service calls when I'm not sure if the customer's monitor is having issues or not. It's small but does it's job. The back is bare circuit board and the edges are very sharp, so use caution when handling it. Would not recommend for gaming.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to help setup cameras on the farm. I needed to be able to check the angle of the cameras display while up on a ladder in the trees. This light weight screen (and a custom rasp video decoder) was easy to carry up the ladder in a pocket and I could check the angle of the cameras without the help of a second person. Surprisingly good picture from this inexpensive little screen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Can’t believe I paid $40 and this thing that functions like a quality extra monitor. Intuitive, simple. I use for writing in grad school. This gadget lover loves it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Plug and play right away
reviews.reviewText: I don't like that it doesn't have a back cover so all of the parts that make it work are exposed and vulnerable.However, it is basically plug and play, and works with no fuss, as soon as you plug in the HDMI and power. Super convenient.
